languages.text: {n}На острие удара шли манипулы скитариев, вооруженных рад-карабинами, фосфексными бомбами и иными, не менее зловещими орудиями. Пейзаж, оставляемый ими за спиной, был подобен алым пустыням священного Марса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}На острие удара шли манипулы скитариев, вооруженных рад-карабинами, фосфексными бомбами и иными, не менее зловещими орудиями. Пейзаж, оставляемый ими за спиной, был подобен алым пустыням священного Марса.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The tip of the spear was comprised of Skitarii maniples armed with radium carbines, phosphex bombs, and other equally fearsome weaponry. The land that they left in their wake resembled the scarlet wastes of sacred Mars.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На острие удара шли манипулы скитариев, вооруженных рад-карабинами, фосфексными бомбами и иными, не менее зловещими орудиями. Пейзаж, оставляемый ими за спиной, был подобен алым пустыням священного Марса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The tip of the spear was comprised of Skitarii maniples armed with radium carbines, phosphex bombs, and other equally fearsome weaponry. The land that they left in their wake resembled the scarlet wastes of the sacred Mars.{/n}

{n}Idira Trass personally visited all of the world's agri-complexes and revealed those whose minds had been afflicted by to the mysterious influence. After their arrest the discontent among the rabble quickly subsided.{/n}

{n}The tip of the spear was comprised of Skitarii maniples armed with radium carbines, phosphex bombs, and other equally fearsome weaponry. The land that they left in their wake resembled the scarlet wastes of the sacred Mars.{/n}

languages.text: {n}由护教军组成的尖刀小队装备了镭射卡宾枪、毒磷炸弹与其他的可怕武器，被他们踏足过的土地都变成了类似神圣火星表面的猩红废土。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tip of the spear was comprised of Skitarii maniples armed with radium carbines, phosphex bombs, and other equally fearsome weaponry. The land that they left in their wake resembled the scarlet wastes of sacred Mars.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}由护教军组成的尖刀小队装备了镭射卡宾枪、毒磷炸弹与其他的可怕武器，被他们踏足过的土地都变成了类似神圣火星表面的猩红废土。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La punta de la lanza estaba compuesta por manípulos Skitarii armados con carabinas radium, bombas de fósfex y otro armamento igualmente aterrador. La tierra que dejaban a su paso se asemejaba a los yermos escarlata del sagrado Marte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tip of the spear was comprised of Skitarii maniples armed with radium carbines, phosphex bombs, and other equally fearsome weaponry. The land that they left in their wake resembled the scarlet wastes of sacred Mars.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La punta de la lanza estaba compuesta por manípulos Skitarii armados con carabinas radium, bombas de fósfex y otro armamento igualmente aterrador. La tierra que dejaban a su paso se asemejaba a los yermos escarlata del sagrado Marte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}槍の先は、ラジウム・カービン、フォスフェックス・ボム、その他同様に恐ろしい武器で武装したスキタリイ・マニプルで構成されていた。彼らが通った跡に残る大地は、神聖な火星に広がる緋色の荒野に似ていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tip of the spear was comprised of Skitarii maniples armed with radium carbines, phosphex bombs, and other equally fearsome weaponry. The land that they left in their wake resembled the scarlet wastes of sacred Mars.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}槍の先は、ラジウム・カービン、フォスフェックス・ボム、その他同様に恐ろしい武器で武装したスキタリイ・マニプルで構成されていた。彼らが通った跡に残る大地は、神聖な火星に広がる緋色の荒野に似ていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'avant-garde est constituée de manipules Skitarii armés de carabines à radium, de bombes à phosphex et d'autres armes non moins terrifiantes. Après leur passage, les terres luxuriantes ont laissé place à un désert évoquant les étendues rougeoyantes de Mars, la planète sacrée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tip of the spear was comprised of Skitarii maniples armed with radium carbines, phosphex bombs, and other equally fearsome weaponry. The land that they left in their wake resembled the scarlet wastes of sacred Mars.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'avant-garde est constituée de manipules Skitarii armés de carabines à radium, de bombes à phosphex et d'autres armes non moins terrifiantes. Après leur passage, les terres luxuriantes ont laissé place à un désert évoquant les étendues rougeoyantes de Mars, la planète sacrée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Speerspitze bestand aus Skitarii-Manipeln, die mit Radium-Karabinern, Phosphexbomben und anderen furchterregenden Waffen ausgerüstet waren. Das Land, das sie hinterließen, erinnerte an die roten Wüsten des heiligen Mars.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tip of the spear was comprised of Skitarii maniples armed with radium carbines, phosphex bombs, and other equally fearsome weaponry. The land that they left in their wake resembled the scarlet wastes of sacred Mars.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Speerspitze bestand aus Skitarii-Manipeln, die mit Radium-Karabinern, Phosphexbomben und anderen furchterregenden Waffen ausgerüstet waren. Das Land, das sie hinterließen, erinnerte an die roten Wüsten des heiligen Mars.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hücum kuvvetlerini radyumlu karabinalar, fosfeks bombaları ve aynı ölçüde ürpertici daha nice silahlar kuşanmış Skitarius birlikleri oluşturdu. Geride bıraktıkları diyar, kutsal Mars'ın kızıl renkteki çorak topraklarını andırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tip of the spear was comprised of Skitarii maniples armed with radium carbines, phosphex bombs, and other equally fearsome weaponry. The land that they left in their wake resembled the scarlet wastes of sacred Mars.{/n}
